description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The ultimate brick-breaking action arcade game fusing all the best elements from Breakout, Tempest and Pinball. Featuring 50 levels of mind-bending revolutionary 360-degree action, over a dozen powerups and over 20 different types of brick, all for an amazing 80 points. SLAM: Indie Edition is not to be missed!

SLAM: Indie Edition is not to be missed!
